name: proceed - a Ludum Dare 47 Compo Entry
name_original: proceed - a Ludum Dare 47 Compo Entry
description:
An entry for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a Loop.

==

Play a platformer that's playing you.  When you think things are simple, chances are you're forgetting something... and the game manager won't just let that slide.

Can you appease the GM and complete the level?

==CONTROLS==

  • A/D - Move Left/Right
  • Space - Jump
  • Point-and-Click - Interact
  • Esc - Quit Game

==TOOLS USED==

  • Blender 2.81
  • Unity 2019 with Unity Hub
  • Unity Post Processing Package, TextMeshPro
  • Paint dot NET
  • Atom Text Editor
  • MAGIX Music Maker

While downloading the game is recommended for the optimal experience, an alternative WebGL build is available:

https://duperroexp.itch.io/proceed-webgl
